content.rendered:
Personal Services

Save 10% at Office Depot

Customers can save 10% at Office Depot! Enroll your Westamerica Personal Debit Card and use it for all your Office Depot purchases. You’ll save 10% off the retail price of most items!*

How it works

  • Simply complete an enrollment form, and take or mail it to your nearest Westamerica Bank branch. To download enrollment form, click here. Forms are also available at any branch.
  • Once enrolled, use your card for all your Office Depot Purchases.
  • If you provide an e-mail address on the enrollment form, you’ll receive a Login Name and Password to use to save online at http://bsd.officedepot.com.    
  • Take advantage of the 10% discount by using the credit feature of your card and signing for your purchase.

Save on these items and more!

  • Everyday supplies: paper, pens, pencils, markers, binders and accessories, school supplies, printer and fax accessories, calendars and planners.
  • Office furniture: desks, chairs, file and storage cabinets, lamps.
  • Custom printing and copying services: business cards, envelopes letterhead, greeting cards.
  • Plus, receive free next business-day delivery when you make a purchase of $50 or more at http://bsd.officedepot.com! **

For more information, please call your local Westamerica Bank branch, or (800) 848-1088 anytime.

* Excluded from the discount are: Gift Cards, any technology item (including but not limited to all computers, monitors, TVs, printing machines, networking, peripherals, cameras, memory, software) postage stamps, check printing, product protection plans; wireless, satellite, internet, technology, installation, and mailing/shipping services; purchases from www.techdepot.com; and any purchase made by contract customers with Store Purchasing or Procurement Cards.

**Place a phone order by 5 p.m. local time (3:00 p.m. by fax) and your order will be delivered FREE the next business day (in our local delivery areas). Deliveries for orders under $50 or outside our local delivery areas will be assessed a delivery charge based on the total order weight (minimum charge of $7.95). Other restrictions apply. Call 800-GO-DEPOT (800-463-3768) or ask a store associate for full details.
